content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -28, -61)
- Wooden chest (position -27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter (position -26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace (position -25, -59)
- Burner inserter (position -23.5, -58.5)
- Storage chest (position -22.5, -58.5) containing iron plates and copper plates

### Secondary Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-18, -53)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -18, -53)
- Wooden chest (position -17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter (position -16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace (position -15, -51)
- Burner inserter (position -13.5, -50.5)
- Storage chest (position -12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates

### Coal Mining Setup at (41, -82)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position 41, -82)
- Wooden chest (position 41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter (position 41.5, -79.5)

### Power Generation System at (-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position -4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler (position -4.5, 16)
- Offshore pump (position -3.5, 27.5)
- Connected pipe networks for water and steam distribution

### Automation Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest (position 5.5, 13.5)
- Input inserter (position 6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine (position 8.5, 13.5)
- Output inserter (position 10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest (position 11.5, 13.5)
- Additional chest (position 6.5, 14.5)
- Connected belt system for material transport

### Research Lab Setup
- Lab with automation science pack input
- Currently researching logistics

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract non-existent items
- Always verify item existence in container before attempting extraction
- Use inspect_inventory to check container contents before extraction
- Handle cases where expected items are not available in storage

### Resource shortage errors in assembling machine
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before starting production
- Monitor and maintain steady supply of copper plates and iron gear wheels
- Set up proper supply chains for continuous production

### Entity status warnings
- Address "waiting for source items" warnings by ensuring proper material flow
- Fix "no ingredients to smelt" issues by maintaining consistent ore supply
- Ensure proper fuel supply for all burner entities

### Inventory management
- Keep track of storage chest contents and their locations
- Implement better inventory monitoring systems
- Set up backup storage solutions for critical resources
